lead_paragraph: Kosovo will make their international debut on Monday in the 2018 World Cup qualifying competition but still need confirmation from FIFA whether nine of their players can switch their national teams and play for the country.

headline.print_headline: Kosovo Awaits Green Light on Players Days Before Historic Game
headline.main: Kosovo Awaits Green Light on Players Days Before Historic Game

snippet: Kosovo will make their international debut on Monday in the 2018 World Cup qualifying competition but still need confirmation from FIFA whether nine of their players can switch their national teams and play for the country....
